title: So when can we expect for the All-Star Diana skin to hit?
body: My hype for it still hasn't died down. Just wondering around which month to expect it.

replies.body: Hasn't been announced just yet - hang tight!
Are we also going to get a second line of SKT T1 Skins for the season 5 victory?
SKT's won like 3 seasons. I think they have enough bloody skins >_<
This was actually the 2nd time.

There's 5 kinds of people in the world
1. The ones who can count
2. The ones who can't

You're the latter.

SKT T1 won the 2013 Season World Championship and the 2015 Season World Championship.
That's the joke.
Oh.
You're thinking of Champions Korea, not Worlds

I am not one who keeps track of LCS or its respective skins. I know pretty much nothing about it.

For example, when I first started playing in S3 and up to nearly halfway through S4, I thought Faker was in TSM.
So, uh, good job proving you're even dumber than I thought you were.

Football fans tell me the exact same thing when I tell them I don't care for football and know very little about it.

And, believe it or not, I really don't care.
Those will be middle of the year as they always have been.
I cant I need a legendary skin for her man
soon ™

Probably around the same time the world skins are revealed. Would only make sense.

> Probably around the same time the world skins are revealed. Would only make sense.

Not really, the Diana skin isn't an e-sport related skin like the worlds skins. It's simply gonna be a fire themed skin.
there was a vote, akali was not on it

I meant this existing skin called "All-Star Akali"
